Installation¶

User install¶

To install simply run: pip install mpl_interactions

Jupyterlab setup¶

If you plan on using mpl_interactions in the notebook then you need to ensure you have a fully working installation of ipympl. The ipympl python package is installed as dependency, however you may need to take a few extra steps to get it to work in jupyterlab. In particular you need to make sure nodejs > 10 is availiable and that you have installed jupyterlab-manager

conda install nodejs=12
jupyter labextension install @jupyter-widgets/jupyterlab-manager

Development Installation¶

First create your own fork of https://github.com/ianhi/mpl-interactions.

git clone <your fork>
cd mpl-interactions
pip install -e.[docs]
